actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Extending the best wishes of the House to the Benjamin Whitcomb Independent Corps of Rangers.

summary.text: Extends the best wishes of the House to the Benjamin Whitcomb Independent Corps of Rangers on the occasion of the re-enactment of the Revolutionary War battle of Bennington, Vermont, and commends the Corps for its continuing educational efforts in connection with the Revolutionary War.

titles.title: Extending the best wishes of the House to the Benjamin Whitcomb Independent Corps of Rangers.
